This game is really great. Kudos to Valve. They always make good games. The optimisation is really great. My PC is old and it can run this game on high settings. The story is great as well. The mechanics are wonderful. They really did the puzzle-solving-portal thing really well. This game made me feel like I was a genius because of some of the puzzles I did. This and other games become really cheap on seasonal sales. I really recommend you buying orange box+this game.

This game is simply incredible. I would go as far to say it's the best game ever created. If you like puzzle games this one is a must. Even if you don't, you should still play, since it's more than a puzzle game. It has a good story to go along with it, and I would play just for the story alone. The lore behind the game is pretty cool too

Easily one of the best games I've ever played. I bought this game before on the PS3 (on which I probably completed it over five times), and honestly I'm proud to say that I own two copies. The quality of this game cannot be measured by it's length in hours, and I'm pleased that after almost a decade it still holds the #1 spot on steam, which it absolutely deserves. If you're considering buying this game, then it is absolutely worth the $9.99 it costs. Portal 2's tenth birthday is in April, so if ten bucks is somehow still too much for you, then it'll likely be over 75% off, if not more.
There is no reason not to play this game. It will leave a mark on you, and will change you as a person; I guarantee it.
